feed.title: Proposal: allocate 8 service bits for experimental use

entry.title: Proposal: allocate 8 service bits for experimental use
entry.summary: On June 18, 2014, Bitcoin core developer and open-source evangelist Jeff Garzik responded to a message from Wladimir. In the original proposal, Wladimir suggested setting aside part of the service bit space for experiments, which was met with agreement from Garzik. Garzik works for BitPay, Inc., a company that provides payment solutions for businesses using blockchain technology.
